Articles.Content:
SU-47 BERKUT

Hi! This time i have for you another fantastic replica, the awesome su-47 100% stock and coloured with kerbpaint.

Not so much to say, you can see the level of details and precision by yourself here:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/YRIfU)

part count: 240

fuel load: 430

manouverability: very good almost at stall limit, infact this airplane was built for test pre stall manouverability.

The plane is coloured with kerbpaint, but it is not needed for make the craft work.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/zYxaJ)

[DOWNLOAD](http://www./download/cof22ziucx73wmo/su-47_berkut_By_Eorin_0_90.craft)

KERBPAINT: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/50008-0-23-KerbPaint-Paint-layering-for-parts-%28September-23rd%29-%28Same-Old-Still-Works!%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/50008-0-23-KerbPaint-Paint-layering-for-parts-%28September-23rd%29-%28Same-Old-Still-Works!%29)

NEW PARTS FOR KERBPAINT: [https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B8M97OfrN8YrVHVCcDFCZTRYT0k/view](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B8M97OfrN8YrVHVCcDFCZTRYT0k/view) credits to Manwith Noname

EXPECT AN UPDATE OF THE CRAFT WHEN PATCH 1.0 CAMES OUT

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-20T13:52:57Z" title="04/20/2015 01:52  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 20, 2015</time> by eorin**

Oo neato you finished it, downloading now lets see how this bad boy flies ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Edit: 

The answer is awesomely well done man love it

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-20T14:03:12Z" title="04/20/2015 02:03  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 20, 2015</time> by Roflcopterkklol**

> 
> Oo neato you finished it, downloading now lets see how this bad boy flies ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

It flies like all my fighters replicas, just a bit more unstable, but i think it respect the real plane in this point.

> 
> It flies like all my fighters replicas, just a bit more unstable, but i think it respect the real plane in this point.

You managed to get it so close to flying like the real thing man, great job in the stock aero

> 
> You managed to get it so close to flying like the real thing man, great job in the stock aero

Thx, now just wait for 1.0 =)

WOW CRAZYYYYY!!! Beautyfull and aggressive \*-\*

Bravo eorin! Gran riproduzione!

> 
> Thx, now just wait for 1.0 =)

Im honestly not looking forward to it ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) I do not think i have ever built something that flies well in FAR despite how well i can make something fly in stock aero lol
That's so neat.. Really cool replica, eorin!
Another great replica. still like the f-22 better but this one is still quite awesome.

> 
> Another great replica. still like the f-22 better but this one is still quite awesome.

I personally prefer this more, but it's only my opinion
just upping this for who don't have seen yet

> 
> FAR compatible?

No it is built with stock aero (0.90), but this craft will be receive an update when 1.0 comes out
